quizDescription: Test your knowledge about the iconic band Guns N' Roses and their legendary rock music!
quizTags: Guns N' Roses, Music, Rock, Hard Rock

questions.question: Which Guns N' Roses song features the famous line 'Welcome to the Jungle'?
questions.explanation: 'Welcome to the Jungle' is a popular Guns N' Roses song known for its energetic and memorable opening line.

questions.question: Which member of Guns N' Roses is known for his exceptional guitar skills and solos?
questions.explanation: Slash, the lead guitarist of Guns N' Roses, is renowned for his exceptional guitar skills and soulful solos.

questions.question: Which Guns N' Roses album features the hit song 'Sweet Child o' Mine'?
questions.explanation: The album 'Appetite for Destruction' features the hit song 'Sweet Child o' Mine.' It was released in 1987 and became one of their most successful albums.

questions.question: What is the title of Guns N' Roses' debut studio album?
questions.explanation: Guns N' Roses' debut studio album is titled 'Appetite for Destruction.' It was released in 1987 and achieved massive commercial success.

questions.question: Which Guns N' Roses song is known for its emotional music video featuring a wedding scene?
questions.explanation: The song 'November Rain' is known for its emotional music video featuring a wedding scene. It is one of Guns N' Roses' most iconic ballads.

questions.question: Which member of Guns N' Roses is the lead vocalist and frontman of the band?
questions.explanation: Axl Rose is the lead vocalist and frontman of Guns N' Roses. He is known for his powerful voice and charismatic stage presence.

questions.question: Which Guns N' Roses song features the famous line 'Take me down to the Paradise City'?
questions.explanation: 'Paradise City' is a popular Guns N' Roses song known for its catchy chorus with the line 'Take me down to the Paradise City.'

questions.question: Which Guns N' Roses album features the ballad 'Patience'?
questions.explanation: The album 'G N' R Lies' features the ballad 'Patience.' It was released in 1988 and is known for its acoustic sound.

questions.question: What is the title of Guns N' Roses' longest studio album, released as a double album?
questions.explanation: Guns N' Roses' longest studio album, released as a double album, is titled 'Use Your Illusion I.' It was released in 1991 alongside 'Use Your Illusion II.'

questions.question: Which member of Guns N' Roses plays the bass guitar?
questions.explanation: Duff McKagan is the bass guitarist of Guns N' Roses. He has been a key member of the band since 1985.
